pageContext.claim: “Iran is going to hell; their economy is in deep trouble. Their GDP went down 20 percent, which nobody ever even heard of before. Probably 25 percent.”
pageContext.analysis:
Iran's gross domestic product contracted by 3.9% in 2018, based on International Monetary Fund estimates.
The IMF said in late April that it expected the Iranian economy to shrink by 6% in 2019.
